localizart.subject: Get Localizar-T new password
localizart.data: [p style="font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#404040;font-weight:normal;font-size:10.0pt;"]Hi! [span style="font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#0A54A8;font-weight:normal;font-size:10.0pt;"][USUARIO][/span]![/p] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#404040"] To reset your Localizar-T password, [a href="https://www.localizar-t.com/[LINK_ACTIVACION]"] visit this web.[/a]. [/span] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#404040"]If it does not work, use this link: [br /][strong style="line-height:14px;"]https://www.localizar-t.com/[LINK_ACTIVACION][/strong] [/span] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#404040"] You have 30 minutes to reset it. Otherwise, you will have to go to Forgot your password again. [/span] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#404040"] Any questions? Contact to [a href="mailto:info@localizar-t.com.ar"]Help Desk[/a]. Please dont answer this email. [/span] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [/div] [div style="line-height:18.75pt"] [span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#404040"] Thanks,[br][b]Localizar-T Team[/b] [/span] [/div]

info_traking_viajes.subject: Tracking [COD_TRAKING]
